etc.aloe.data
Class EvaluationReport

java.lang.Object
  etc.aloe.data.EvaluationReport
All Implemented Interfaces:
Saving
public class EvaluationReport
extends java.lang.Object
implements Saving

The EvaluationReport contains data about model performance as compared to a source of truth data.

Constructor Summary
EvaluationReport(java.lang.String name)
          Construct an equal-cost evaluation report
EvaluationReport(java.lang.String name, double falsePositiveCost, double falseNegativeCost)
          Construct a cost-sensitive evaluation report.

 double getAverageCost()
          Gets the cost of all misclassified examples divided by the total number of examples.
 double getCohensKappa()
          Get Cohen's kappa, the probability of agreement with the truth data, corrected by the probability of random agreement.

          Get the number of examples with a negative prediction that was incorrect.

          PercentIncorrect = (FP + FN) / (TP + TN + FP + FN)
